Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Cimmay
Reviews.Content: This TV is a good deal, easy to use and setup. Haier has discount insert for the Roku streaming stick, the flyer says $10, but at checkout the discount is $20. It works very good with fast action sports like live ice hockey off Roku. No problems at all plugging in Roku or hooking up DVD/VHS machine. Picture quality is outstanding, no adjustments needed.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, almost five stars
Reviews.Author: David Good
Reviews.Content: I love this tv, don't get me wrong. Has great video and looks super. I only have two complaints (so far). First, I understand that with these flat panel displays it's challenging for manufacturers to find a place to put the speakers. Best I can tell they have them pointing directly down from the plastic panel. Unfortunately if you have the TV in say, an old-style entertainment stand, this causes a really tinny echoy sound.I hooked a couple of PC speakers to the headset port and improved the TVs sound dramatically. But for what you pay for an HDTV, you shouldn't have to do this.Second, Haier is offering a discount on a Roku Streaming Stick as a promotion. I'd like to point out this is slightly misleading. The $10 discount is ONLY applicable to the Streaming Stick for MHL - which is some sort of funky mobile version of HDMI. Technically this is nice because MHL carries power so you don't need to hook it up to USB for power.My two problems with this is that first, the MHL streaming stick costs $69, not the $49 of the regular streaming stick - so you're actually not saving money. Even after the $10 discount you're still spending more. Second, if you have another TV that doesn't have this funky new port that no one's ever heard of, well, you're out of luck. Your fancy Roku won't work with it. This coupon code is ONLY applicable to the MHL version so don't be fooled - make sure you know what you're getting if you choose to take advantage of it.If the sound was a teensy bit better and the streaming stick discount was applicable to ANY roku purchase, this would be five stars for sure.Edit 4/3/14:By the way if you bought this TV and the sound changes unexpectedly, check the audio menu and check to see if "Auto Volume" is on. If it is, turn it off. This should fix your sound issue.

Reviews.Title: We love the tv and the price.
Reviews.Author: homeschoolX3
Reviews.Content: At $299 this tv  amazing. The picture is superb and it was extremely simple to set up. Basically ready right out of the box. We will probably end up getting a different surround sound or audio bar so the audio quality can match the visual. Overall I am pleased with our purchase. Shipping was extremely quick. 3 business days and it was at my door.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: MWM
Reviews.Content: Good picture and size is perfect. But there are no optical or audio outputs. I was shocked when I went to hook up the sound bar. Only option is head phone out plug using MP3 cable to sound bar input. Analog signal but better than nothing...

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal quick shiiping Tv itself is awesome
Reviews.Author: SHIYU XIA
Reviews.Content: shipping is good and tv is awesome especially under this price. If it can come with a cable that wil be better.

Reviews.Title: Speakers too low & Fade out
Reviews.Author: Hansel
Reviews.Content: I gave it a 4/5 because everything about this tv is great besides the fact that the speakers are extremely low & randomly fade to sound really low. I suggest a sound-bar if you buy this TV if your buying it for your living room. Quality is great

Reviews.Title: Good Price
Reviews.Author: James R Denk
Reviews.Content: Decent TV at a great price. Gonna use as my hot tob TV. WIll update as I use it more

Reviews.Title: A steal!
Reviews.Author: Robert R. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Saw this advertised on Amazon at a good price, plus a discount for purchasing an Amazon credit card. I purchased it. Had no trouble setting it up and programming it.  Picture is awesome! Clear and stunning. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Haier LED TV!!
Reviews.Author: Juan E.
Reviews.Content: Excellent LED TV with many features that you will find in others expensive brands. I chose Haier because I got an old LCD and it has been working without any problems for more than three years. very satisfied with this purchase and with the seller service!
